16#include <config.h>
17
18#include <inttypes.h>
19#include <stdbool.h>
20
21#include <isc/buffer.h>
22#include <isc/log.h>
23#include <isc/hash.h>
24#include <isc/mem.h>
25#include <isc/mutex.h>
26#include <isc/platform.h>
27#include <isc/print.h>
28#include <isc/string.h>
29#include <isc/time.h>
30#include <isc/util.h>
31
32#include <dns/badcache.h>
33#include <dns/name.h>
34#include <dns/rdatatype.h>
35#include <dns/types.h>
36
37typedef struct dns_bcentry dns_bcentry_t;
38
39struct dns_badcache {
40 unsigned int magic;
41 isc_mutex_t lock;
42 isc_mem_t *mctx;
43
44 dns_bcentry_t **table;
45 unsigned int count;
46 unsigned int minsize;
47 unsigned int size;
48 unsigned int sweep;
49};
50
51#define BADCACHE_MAGIC ISC_MAGIC('B', 'd', 'C', 'a')
52#define VALID_BADCACHE(m) ISC_MAGIC_VALID(m, BADCACHE_MAGIC)
53
54struct dns_bcentry {
55 dns_bcentry_t * next;
56 dns_rdatatype_t type;
57 isc_time_t expire;
58 uint32_t flags;
59 unsigned int hashval;
60 dns_name_t name;
61};
62
63static isc_result_t
64badcache_resize(dns_badcache_t *bc, isc_time_t *now, bool grow);
65
66isc_result_t
67dns_badcache_init(isc_mem_t *mctx, unsigned int size, dns_badcache_t **bcp) {
68 isc_result_t result;
69 dns_badcache_t *bc = NULL;
70
71 REQUIRE(bcp != NULL && *bcp == NULL);
72 REQUIRE(mctx != NULL);
73
74 bc = isc_mem_get(mctx, sizeof(dns_badcache_t));
75 if (bc == NULL)
76 return (ISC_R_NOMEMORY);
77 memset(bc, 0, sizeof(dns_badcache_t));
78
79 isc_mem_attach(mctx, &bc->mctx);
80 isc_mutex_init(&bc->lock);
81
82 bc->table = isc_mem_get(bc->mctx, sizeof(*bc->table) * size);
83 if (bc->table == NULL) {
84 result = ISC_R_NOMEMORY;
85 goto destroy_lock;
86 }
87
88 bc->size = bc->minsize = size;
89 memset(bc->table, 0, bc->size * sizeof(dns_bcentry_t *));
90
91 bc->count = 0;
92 bc->sweep = 0;
93 bc->magic = BADCACHE_MAGIC;
94
95 *bcp = bc;
96 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
97
98 destroy_lock:
99 isc_mutex_destroy(&bc->lock);
100 isc_mem_putanddetach(&bc->mctx, bc, sizeof(dns_badcache_t));
101 return (result);
102}
103
104void
105dns_badcache_destroy(dns_badcache_t **bcp) {
106 dns_badcache_t *bc;
107
108 REQUIRE(bcp != NULL && *bcp != NULL);
109 bc = *bcp;
110
111 dns_badcache_flush(bc);
112
113 bc->magic = 0;
114 isc_mutex_destroy(&bc->lock);
115 isc_mem_put(bc->mctx, bc->table, sizeof(dns_bcentry_t *) * bc->size);
116 isc_mem_putanddetach(&bc->mctx, bc, sizeof(dns_badcache_t));
117 *bcp = NULL;
118}
119
120static isc_result_t
121badcache_resize(dns_badcache_t *bc, isc_time_t *now, bool grow) {
122 dns_bcentry_t **newtable, *bad, *next;
123 unsigned int newsize, i;
124
125 if (grow)
126 newsize = bc->size * 2 + 1;
127 else
128 newsize = (bc->size - 1) / 2;
129
130 newtable = isc_mem_get(bc->mctx, sizeof(dns_bcentry_t *) * newsize);
131 if (newtable == NULL)
132 return (ISC_R_NOMEMORY);
133 memset(newtable, 0, sizeof(dns_bcentry_t *) * newsize);
134
135 for (i = 0; bc->count > 0 && i < bc->size; i++) {
136 for (bad = bc->table[i]; bad != NULL; bad = next) {
137 next = bad->next;
138 if (isc_time_compare(&bad->expire, now) < 0) {
139 isc_mem_put(bc->mctx, bad,
140 sizeof(*bad) + bad->name.length);
141 bc->count--;
142 } else {
143 bad->next = newtable[bad->hashval % newsize];
144 newtable[bad->hashval % newsize] = bad;
145 }
146 }
147 bc->table[i] = NULL;
148 }
149
150 isc_mem_put(bc->mctx, bc->table, sizeof(*bc->table) * bc->size);
151 bc->size = newsize;
152 bc->table = newtable;
153
154 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
155}
156
157void
158dns_badcache_add(dns_badcache_t *bc, const dns_name_t *name,
159 dns_rdatatype_t type, bool update,
160 uint32_t flags, isc_time_t *expire)
161{
162 isc_result_t result;
163 unsigned int i, hashval;
164 dns_bcentry_t *bad, *prev, *next;
165 isc_time_t now;
166
167 REQUIRE(VALID_BADCACHE(bc));
168 REQUIRE(name != NULL);
169 REQUIRE(expire != NULL);
170
171 LOCK(&bc->lock);
172
173 result = isc_time_now(&now);
174 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
175 isc_time_settoepoch(&now);
176
177 hashval = dns_name_hash(name, false);
178 i = hashval % bc->size;
179 prev = NULL;
180 for (bad = bc->table[i]; bad != NULL; bad = next) {
181 next = bad->next;
182 if (bad->type == type && dns_name_equal(name, &bad->name)) {
183 if (update) {
184 bad->expire = *expire;
185 bad->flags = flags;
186 }
187 break;
188 }
189 if (isc_time_compare(&bad->expire, &now) < 0) {
190 if (prev == NULL)
191 bc->table[i] = bad->next;
192 else
193 prev->next = bad->next;
194 isc_mem_put(bc->mctx, bad,
195 sizeof(*bad) + bad->name.length);
196 bc->count--;
197 } else
198 prev = bad;
199 }
200
201 if (bad == NULL) {
202 isc_buffer_t buffer;
203 bad = isc_mem_get(bc->mctx, sizeof(*bad) + name->length);
204 if (bad == NULL)
205 goto cleanup;
206 bad->type = type;
207 bad->hashval = hashval;
208 bad->expire = *expire;
209 bad->flags = flags;
210 isc_buffer_init(&buffer, bad + 1, name->length);
211 dns_name_init(&bad->name, NULL);
212 dns_name_copy(name, &bad->name, &buffer);
213 bad->next = bc->table[i];
214 bc->table[i] = bad;
215 bc->count++;
216 if (bc->count > bc->size * 8)
217 badcache_resize(bc, &now, true);
218 if (bc->count < bc->size * 2 && bc->size > bc->minsize)
219 badcache_resize(bc, &now, false);
220 } else
221 bad->expire = *expire;
222
223 cleanup:
224 UNLOCK(&bc->lock);
225}
226
227bool
228dns_badcache_find(dns_badcache_t *bc, const dns_name_t *name,
229 dns_rdatatype_t type, uint32_t *flagp,
230 isc_time_t *now)
231{
232 dns_bcentry_t *bad, *prev, *next;
233 bool answer = false;
234 unsigned int i;
235
236 REQUIRE(VALID_BADCACHE(bc));
237 REQUIRE(name != NULL);
238 REQUIRE(now != NULL);
239
240 LOCK(&bc->lock);
241
242 /*
243 * XXXMUKS: dns_name_equal() is expensive as it does a
244 * octet-by-octet comparison, and it can be made better in two
245 * ways here. First, lowercase the names (use
246 * dns_name_downcase() instead of dns_name_copy() in
247 * dns_badcache_add()) so that dns_name_caseequal() can be used
248 * which the compiler will emit as SIMD instructions. Second,
249 * don't put multiple copies of the same name in the chain (or
250 * multiple names will have to be matched for equality), but use
251 * name->link to store the type specific part.
252 */
253
254 if (bc->count == 0)
255 goto skip;
256
257 i = dns_name_hash(name, false) % bc->size;
258 prev = NULL;
259 for (bad = bc->table[i]; bad != NULL; bad = next) {
260 next = bad->next;
261 /*
262 * Search the hash list. Clean out expired records as we go.
263 */
264 if (isc_time_compare(&bad->expire, now) < 0) {
265 if (prev != NULL)
266 prev->next = bad->next;
267 else
268 bc->table[i] = bad->next;
269
270 isc_mem_put(bc->mctx, bad, sizeof(*bad) +
271 bad->name.length);
272 bc->count--;
273 continue;
274 }
275 if (bad->type == type && dns_name_equal(name, &bad->name)) {
276 if (flagp != NULL)
277 *flagp = bad->flags;
278 answer = true;
279 break;
280 }
281 prev = bad;
282 }
283 skip:
284
285 /*
286 * Slow sweep to clean out stale records.
287 */
288 i = bc->sweep++ % bc->size;
289 bad = bc->table[i];
290 if (bad != NULL && isc_time_compare(&bad->expire, now) < 0) {
291 bc->table[i] = bad->next;
292 isc_mem_put(bc->mctx, bad, sizeof(*bad) + bad->name.length);
293 bc->count--;
294 }
295
296 UNLOCK(&bc->lock);
297 return (answer);
298}
299
300void
301dns_badcache_flush(dns_badcache_t *bc) {
302 dns_bcentry_t *entry, *next;
303 unsigned int i;
304
305 REQUIRE(VALID_BADCACHE(bc));
306
307 for (i = 0; bc->count > 0 && i < bc->size; i++) {
308 for (entry = bc->table[i]; entry != NULL; entry = next) {
309 next = entry->next;
310 isc_mem_put(bc->mctx, entry, sizeof(*entry) +
311 entry->name.length);
312 bc->count--;
313 }
314 bc->table[i] = NULL;
315 }
316}
317
318void
319dns_badcache_flushname(dns_badcache_t *bc, const dns_name_t *name) {
320 dns_bcentry_t *bad, *prev, *next;
321 isc_result_t result;
322 isc_time_t now;
323 unsigned int i;
324
325 REQUIRE(VALID_BADCACHE(bc));
326 REQUIRE(name != NULL);
327
328 LOCK(&bc->lock);
329
330 result = isc_time_now(&now);
331 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
332 isc_time_settoepoch(&now);
333 i = dns_name_hash(name, false) % bc->size;
334 prev = NULL;
335 for (bad = bc->table[i]; bad != NULL; bad = next) {
336 int n;
337 next = bad->next;
338 n = isc_time_compare(&bad->expire, &now);
339 if (n < 0 || dns_name_equal(name, &bad->name)) {
340 if (prev == NULL)
341 bc->table[i] = bad->next;
342 else
343 prev->next = bad->next;
344
345 isc_mem_put(bc->mctx, bad, sizeof(*bad) +
346 bad->name.length);
347 bc->count--;
348 } else
349 prev = bad;
350 }
351
352 UNLOCK(&bc->lock);
353}
354
355void
356dns_badcache_flushtree(dns_badcache_t *bc, const dns_name_t *name) {
357 dns_bcentry_t *bad, *prev, *next;
358 unsigned int i;
359 int n;
360 isc_time_t now;
361 isc_result_t result;
362
363 REQUIRE(VALID_BADCACHE(bc));
364 REQUIRE(name != NULL);
365
366 LOCK(&bc->lock);
367
368 result = isc_time_now(&now);
369 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
370 isc_time_settoepoch(&now);
371
372 for (i = 0; bc->count > 0 && i < bc->size; i++) {
373 prev = NULL;
374 for (bad = bc->table[i]; bad != NULL; bad = next) {
375 next = bad->next;
376 n = isc_time_compare(&bad->expire, &now);
377 if (n < 0 || dns_name_issubdomain(&bad->name, name)) {
378 if (prev == NULL)
379 bc->table[i] = bad->next;
380 else
381 prev->next = bad->next;
382
383 isc_mem_put(bc->mctx, bad, sizeof(*bad) +
384 bad->name.length);
385 bc->count--;
386 } else
387 prev = bad;
388 }
389 }
390
391 UNLOCK(&bc->lock);
392}
393
394
395void
396dns_badcache_print(dns_badcache_t *bc, const char *cachename, FILE *fp) {
397 char namebuf[DNS_NAME_FORMATSIZE];
398 char typebuf[DNS_RDATATYPE_FORMATSIZE];
399 dns_bcentry_t *bad, *next, *prev;
400 isc_time_t now;
401 unsigned int i;
402 uint64_t t;
403
404 REQUIRE(VALID_BADCACHE(bc));
405 REQUIRE(cachename != NULL);
406 REQUIRE(fp != NULL);
407
408 LOCK(&bc->lock);
409 fprintf(fp, ";\n; %s\n;\n", cachename);
410
411 TIME_NOW(&now);
412 for (i = 0; bc->count > 0 && i < bc->size; i++) {
413 prev = NULL;
414 for (bad = bc->table[i]; bad != NULL; bad = next) {
415 next = bad->next;
416 if (isc_time_compare(&bad->expire, &now) < 0) {
417 if (prev != NULL)
418 prev->next = bad->next;
419 else
420 bc->table[i] = bad->next;
421
422 isc_mem_put(bc->mctx, bad, sizeof(*bad) +
423 bad->name.length);
424 bc->count--;
425 continue;
426 }
427 prev = bad;
428 dns_name_format(&bad->name, namebuf, sizeof(namebuf));
429 dns_rdatatype_format(bad->type, typebuf,
430 sizeof(typebuf));
431 t = isc_time_microdiff(&bad->expire, &now);
432 t /= 1000;
433 fprintf(fp, "; %s/%s [ttl "
434 "%" PRIu64 "]\n",
435 namebuf, typebuf, t);
436 }
437 }
438 UNLOCK(&bc->lock);
439}
